name: Jay Jablonski
biography: Jay Jablonski was born in November 1977 in Bernards Township, New Jersey, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for Take Me Home Tonight (2011), The Big Short (2015) and Bad Moms (2016).::Anonymous
trivia: A knee injury while playing football at college prevented him from becoming a United States Marine.
Attended Gettysburg College in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
Attended William Annin Middle School in Bernards, New Jersey.
Graduated from Ridge High School in Bernards, New Jersey in 1995.
Son of Lou and Mary Beth Jablonski and brothers of Peter and Andrew Jablonski.
filmography: The Secret Life of the American Teenager
